title: Number of visitors to the Rocky Mountain National Park in the U.S. 2008 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of visitors in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
In general Number of visitors in millions has rose over the Year.

Number of visitors in millions is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, roughly increasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2012, rapidly increasing from 2012 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Number of visitors in millions, of value 4.67 was reached at Year 2019
The lowest Number of visitors in millions, of value 2.76 was reported at Year 2008
